title: 80/230. Financial arrangements and procedures for the implementation of resolution 2719 (2023)
text:
United Nations 
A/RES/80/230 
 
General Assembly 
Distr.: General 
22 December 2025 
25-20948 (E) 
*2520948* 
 
 
Eightieth session 
Agenda item 148 
Administrative and budgetary aspects of the financing of the 
United Nations peacekeeping operations 
 
 
 
 
 Resolution adopted by the General Assembly 
on 18 December 2025 
 
 
[on the report of the Fifth Committee (A/80/527, para. 6)] 
 
 
 80/230. Financial arrangements and procedures for the implementation of 
resolution 2719 (2023) 
 
 
 
The General Assembly, 
 
Having considered the report of the Secretary-General on the financial 
arrangements and procedures for the implementation of resolution 2719 (2023)1 and 
the related report of the Advisory Committee on Administrative and Budgetary 
Questions,2 
 
1. 
Takes note of the report of the Secretary-General;  
 
2. 
Endorses the conclusions and recommendations contained in the report of 
the Advisory Committee on Administrative and Budgetary Questions. 
 
69th plenary meeting 
18 December 2025 
 
_______________ 
 
1 A/80/88. 
 
2 A/80/393.

paragraphs.1: Takes note of the report of the Secretary-General;
paragraphs.2: Endorses the conclusions and recommendations contained in the report of the Advisory Committee on Administrative and Budgetary Questions. 69th plenary meeting 18 December 2025 _______________ 1 A/80/88. 2 A/80/393.
